The risk mitigation factors in "Section 3 - Climate- Related Risks and Risk Mitigation" and initiatives to realize opportunities discussed in this Section of the Sustainability Report, together with factors addressed in "Section 4 - Our Business & Strategy" of our AIF, are expected to promote our ability to adapt and succeed in a lower carbon economy.
